Text: kilik014, are you sure you know how to rate a movie?  If 7 for a cam is like DVD quality.  Hos does look a DVD rip rated 10?  So crisp amd realistic you are IN the movie like virtual reality?  Wake up man, you dont make sense.  And by the way, a little tip for rating movies.  There is a scale of 0 to 10 for cam, 0 to 10 for TS and 0 to 10 for DVD, NOT 0 to 10 for cam TS and DVD combined.
